drug.name: Pegnivacogin
drug.indication: Investigated for use/treatment in thrombosis, coronary artery disease, and vascular diseases.

drug-interaction.name: Peginterferon alfa-2a
drug-interaction.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Pegnivacogin can be decreased when used in combination with Peginterferon alfa-2a.
